title: Strawberry and rhubarb custard pie
ingredients: ['300g (11 oz) caster sugar', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '3/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '3 eggs, beaten', '500g (1 1/4 lb) chopped rhubarb', '500g (1 1/4 lb) fresh strawberries, hulled and halved', '1 package shortcrust pastry', '1 egg white, lightly beaten']
